<title level="1" pfs="Limited">[Monster Hunter](/NPCs.aspx?ID=924)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Some mercenaries eschew the complications of politics, oaths of service, and fealty and just get paid to hunt monsters. It's a straightforward form of mercenary service, often dangerous in the extreme, but one that can yield glory and fame.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 22

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 20

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 6">[Monster Hunter](/NPCs.aspx?ID=924)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 227</row>

**Perception** +13

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +15, [Monster Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +13, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +13, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +11

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +3

**Con** +3

**Int** +1

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +1
</row>

**Items**
[Composite Longbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=74) (20 arrows), [_+1 greataxe_](/Weapons.aspx?ID=21), [Hide Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=7)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 23 

**Fort** +15 

**Ref** +11 

**Will** +13 

</row>

**HP** 108

**[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)** <actions string="Reaction" /> 

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_greataxe_ +15 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194)),
**Damage** 1d12+8 slashing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
composite longbow +14 ([deadly d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Propulsive](/Traits.aspx?ID=191), [range increment 100 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 0](/Traits.aspx?ID=254), [volley 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=201)),
**Damage** 1d8+6 piercing

**Rage** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) **Requirements** The monster hunter isn't [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=15) or raging; **Effect** The monster hunter gains 9 temporary Hit Points that last until the rage ends. While raging, they deal 8 additional damage with melee attacks, gain a +10-foot status bonus to their Speed, and take a -1 penalty to AC. The monster hunter can't use [concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32) actions except [Seek](/Actions.aspx?ID=84) and [rage](/Traits.aspx?ID=135) actions. The rage lasts for 1 minute, until there are no enemies the monster hunter can perceive, or until the monster hunter falls [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38). Once the rage ends, the monster hunter can't Rage again for 1 minute.

**Sudden Charge** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The monster hunter Strides twice and makes a melee Strike.

</column>
